EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Monitoring System - Activation Guide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing SunPower as your solar provider.
The following are steps on how to create an account and log in to your SunPower Monitoring System
To create an account: 1. Go to http://us.sunpower.com/ 2. Click on MY SUNPOWER on the upper right corner of the screen, then select HOMEOWNERS or go directly to the Sign in Page: https://monitor.us.sunpower.com/ 3. Click on Create Account 4. Type in your email address (Confirm) 5. Click Next 6. Type in your serial number a. Device Serial Number(INSERT DEVICE SERIAL NUMBER HERE) 7. Click on LOOK UP 8. Double check if address is correct 9. Click on CONFIRM 10. Complete the required information 11. Read Terms and Conditions and check the tick box 12. Click on CREATE 13. You will be automatically logged in, at the same time, receive an email validation link to the email that you registered. 14. Click on the link to proceed with the validation
To log in: 1. Enter your username 2. Enter your password 3. Click on SIGN IN
You may now check and monitor your Energy production!
